content.rendered:
Thursday, April 3rd  

     Today is an “B” day 

                                                                     

  • We’re back again this morning to dish out some Bucks by the Boatload. Teachers, please have your LiveSchool accounts ready and award 25 Blue Streak Bucks to each student who is prepared for class. That’s right, 25 bucks! Students – keep following the 4 B’s to earn more Bucks by the Boatload! 

 

  • Lunch today is Macaroni & Cheese, corn muffin, steamed broccoli and 

                            warm cinnamon apples.  

 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

 

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
